about_the_game:
Rpg Era is a free-for-all RPG game for adventure, survival, and leisure. A lot of fun. Your family is a magical family that connects earth to the other world. You and your sister as well as ordinary people live in the earth, but in your 18th birthday, father sent a package, your uncle has been to take care of you, he doesn't know the content of this package is simple, don't let you to open it, after a few things of turnover, this package has changed in the future, you and your sister's world door is now open, more content in RpgEra!At present, there are not many ideas in the ending. This game is still in continuous update. If you want to play more content, please wait for the update!
